dialogs.patient: Recently, I am experiencing dizziness and vomitng
dialogs.doctor: Oh, do you have any Unconsciousness?
Any trouble concentrating or memory problems?

dialogs.patient: Yes, I've been having trouble concentrating and I've been forgetting things more often.
Yes, my speech has been slurred and I've been having trouble forming words.
dialogs.doctor: It is possible that the patient could be suffering from a traumatic brain injury. This is because dizziness and vomiting are common symptoms of a TBI.
